text: 20.4 The LLDC is currently the planning authority for part of the borough of Tower Hamlets, but it does not have a separate apportionment. The council is therefore planning for waste across its whole administrative area. We will continue to work closely with the LLDC on delivering our strategic plan for waste. 20.5 Our duties as a waste collection authority and waste disposal authority include helping households to prevent waste as well as reuse items and recycle as much waste as possible.
